title: I Want To Sleep With Idol-Kun!
alternative_title: I Want To Sleep With Idol-Kun! ; Idol-Kun ni Dakaretai! ; アイドルくんに抱かれたい！
status: I Want To Sleep With Idol-Kun! ; Idol-Kun ni Dakaretai! ; アイドルくんに抱かれたい！
description:
Description :
        Ao is an idol that captivates thousands with his aloof charm, but behind the scenes hides a crippling case of shyness and a personality akin to a lost puppy. Determined to up his fanservice game, he seeks help from the retired idol Shinji. In exchange for coaching him, Shinji wants him to be a friend with benefits! Problem is, Ao takes things way too seriously, and Shinji's patience is wearing thin! As Ao stumbles through his lessons, he finds himself falling for Shinji. When Shinji, scared of love, becomes aware of Ao's feelings, he tries to cut ties, but...!
